clinical_history: Urinary difficulty and suspected prostate enlargement.
findings: Soft tissue region demonstrates smooth-walled without fluid collection.
Uterus appears homogeneous; endometrial thickness measures 21.97 mm.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 27.58 bpm.
Breast tissue shows ill-defined lesion measuring 4.92 mm.
Urinary bladder is well-defined, no intraluminal lesions.
Liver appears coarse with no focal lesions.
